name: Kungfucious - VR Wuxia Kung Fu Simulator
name_original: Kungfucious - VR Wuxia Kung Fu Simulator
description:
Kungfucious is a VR Kung Fu Simulator/Sandbox where Violence is Virtue. Master the use of Meridian Points and Chi Skills to become the one true Kung Fu Master!

FEATURES



Learn and use Meridian points to immobilize enemies and reveal their weak points.



Dodge or Parry attacks to activate slow-mo!



Harness the power of Chi into devastating attacks.


SPONSOR

Kungfucious is developed with help from Nexon Computer Museum
